Package org.exist

Interface Summary
Namespaces Global namespace declarations.
StandaloneServer.ServletBootstrap  
 

Class Summary
Indexer Parses a given input document via SAX, stores it to the database and handles index-creation.
JettyStart This class provides a main method to start Jetty with eXist.
ServerShutdown Call the main method of this class to shut down a running database instance.
Setup Initial database setup: called from the installer to set the admin password.
StandaloneServer Starts eXist in standalone server mode.
 

Exception Summary
EXistException General exception type.
